statements: SELECT * FROM celebrity_fashion_trends;
SELECT celeb_name, popular_color FROM celebrity_fashion_trends;
SELECT celeb_name, popular_style FROM celebrity_fashion_trends WHERE popular_color='Red';
SELECT * FROM celebrity_fashion_trends WHERE celeb_id=1;
SELECT celeb_id, celeb_name, popular_style FROM celebrity_fashion_trends ORDER BY celeb_name DESC;
SELECT celeb_name, popular_style FROM celebrity_fashion_trends;
SELECT celeb_name, popular_color FROM celebrity_fashion_trends WHERE popular_color = 'Red';
SELECT celeb_name, popular_style FROM celebrity_fashion_trends ORDER BY celeb_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM celebrity_fashion_trends WHERE celeb_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT celeb_name, popular_color, popular_style FROM celebrity_fashion_trends WHERE celeb_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Colors;
SELECT color_name, popularity FROM Colors WHERE popularity > 100;
SELECT color_name FROM Colors ORDER BY popularity DESC;
SELECT color_id, color_name FROM Colors WHERE color_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT color_name FROM Colors WHERE color_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT * FROM Colors WHERE popularity > 50 ORDER BY color_name DESC;
SELECT color_name, popularity FROM Colors WHERE color_id = 3;
SELECT color_name, COUNT(*) as total FROM Colors GROUP BY color_name ORDER BY total DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT color_name FROM Colors WHERE popularity BETWEEN 30 AND 70;
SELECT Colors.color_name, Styles.style_name FROM Colors JOIN Styles ON Colors.color_id = Styles.style_id;
SELECT * FROM popular_colors;
SELECT color_name FROM popular_colors ORDER BY color_name DESC;
SELECT style_name FROM popular_styles WHERE style_id = 2;
SELECT celebrity_name, color_name FROM celebrity_fashion JOIN popular_colors ON celebrity_fashion.color_id = popular_colors.color_id;
SELECT * FROM celebrity_fashion WHERE style_id = 1 ORDER BY celebrity_name ASC;
SELECT color_name FROM popular_colors WHERE color_id = 1
SELECT celebrity_name, style_name FROM celebrity_fashion JOIN popular_styles ON celebrity_fashion.style_id = popular_styles.style_id
SELECT color_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM popular_colors GROUP BY color_name ORDER BY total_count DESC

SELECT celebrity_name, style_name, color_name FROM celebrity_fashion JOIN popular_styles ON celebrity_fashion.style_id = popular_styles.style_id JOIN popular_colors ON celebrity_fashion.color_id = popular_colors.color_id
SELECT celebrity_name, COUNT(*) AS total_styles FROM celebrity_fashion GROUP BY celebrity_name HAVING total_styles > 1
SELECT * FROM celebrity;
SELECT name, age FROM celebrity WHERE profession = 'Actor';
SELECT trend_name, popularity FROM fashion_trends ORDER BY popularity DESC;
SELECT color_name, hex_code FROM color_palette WHERE rgb_value LIKE '%255%';
SELECT style_name, category, description FROM style_guide WHERE category = 'Summer';
SELECT * FROM celebrity WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, name, age FROM celebrity WHERE profession = 'Actor';
SELECT trend_name, trend_type, popularity FROM fashion_trends WHERE popularity >= 50 ORDER BY popularity DESC;
SELECT color_name, hex_code, rgb_value FROM color_palette WHERE color_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY color_name ASC;
SELECT style_name, category FROM style_guide WHERE category = 'Summer Wear' OR category = 'Winter Wear';
SELECT * FROM colors WHERE color_name = 'Red';
SELECT outfit_name, color_name FROM outfits JOIN colors ON outfits.color_id = colors.color_id;
SELECT celebrity_name, celebrity_age FROM celebrities WHERE celebrity_age > 30 ORDER BY celebrity_age DESC;
SELECT outfit_name, color_name, style_name FROM outfits JOIN colors ON outfits.color_id = colors.color_id JOIN styles ON outfits.style_id = styles.style_id;

SELECT celebrity_name, outfit_name FROM celebrities JOIN celebrity_outfits ON celebrities.celebrity_id = celebrity_outfits.celebrity_id JOIN outfits ON celebrity_outfits.outfit_id = outfits.outfit_id;
SELECT * FROM colors WHERE color_name = 'Blue';
SELECT celebrity_name, celebrity_age FROM celebrities WHERE celebrity_age > 30 ORDER BY celebrity_name ASC;
SELECT outfit_name FROM outfits WHERE color_id = 3 AND style_id = 2;

SELECT celebrity_name, outfit_name FROM celebrities INNER JOIN celebrity_outfits ON celebrities.celebrity_id = celebrity_outfits.celebrity_id INNER JOIN outfits ON celebrity_outfits.outfit_id = outfits.outfit_id WHERE celebrity_age < 30 AND color_id = 1;
SELECT style_name, COUNT(outfit_id) AS total_outfits FROM styles LEFT JOIN outfits ON styles.style_id = outfits.style_id GROUP BY style_name HAVING total_outfits > 2 ORDER BY total_outfits DESC;
